title: Memorials of his time,
author: Cockburn, Henry Cockburn
snippet: The two best about this time were Mrs. Elizabeth Hamilton, the authoress of the Cottagers of Glenburnie, and Mrs. Grant, widow of a minister of Laggan, who had unfolded herself in the u Letters from the Mountains " an interesting treasury of good solitary thoughts.

title: Aground in the Shallows. A novel
author: Ray, Catherine.
snippet: There was Buchanan's" History of Scotland," a volume of Burns'poems, the " Cottages of Glenburnie," aGazetteer, one of Scott's novels, a " Historyof the Covenanters," and a book of sermons—not a very large selection, and not particularlyinteresting to a girl Maggie's age.
